summary: During the Cold War, an organization called "Patriot" created a super-hero squad, which includes members of multiple Soviet republics. For years, the heroes had to hide their identities, but in hard times they must show themselves again.
cast: Anton Pampushnyy|Sanjar Madi|Sebastien Sisak|Alina Lanina|Valeriya Shkirando|Vyacheslav Razbegaev|Stanislav Shirin|Aleksandr Komissarov|Nikolay Shestak|Elizaveta Polyakova|Viktor Mishchenchuk|Polina Polyakova|Yuriy Pilyugin|Svetlana Tulskaya|Andrey Bobrov|Mila Maximova|Yuliya Afanaseva|Igor Maslov|Aleksandr Titarenko|Sergey Kulik|Evgeniy Venediktov|Igor Litovkin|Alla Semyonova|Eduard Chemodakov|Dmitriy Murashev|Pavel Kuzin|Taras Onoprienko|Viktor Evtushenko|Anton Novikov|Nikita Pomerantsev|Vasiliy Minin|Aleksandr Semyonov|Aleksey Kondrashov|Timur Oragvelidze|Pavel Khrulyov|Konstantin Adaev|Liliya Kochkareva|Vladimir Lukyanchikov|Vladimir Butenko|Ilya Isaev|John F. Kennedy|Marusya Klimova|Yuliya Medvedeva-Titarenko|Vladimir Rybalchenko|Dima Savyan|Sergey Shatalov|Anna Shkil|Pyotr Travnikov
keywords: villain|superhero team|supernatural power|non comic book superhero|murder
title: Guardianes
